brooklyn.enricher.basic
[Java] Class AddingEnricher

java.lang.Object
  brooklyn.policy.basic.AbstractEntityAdjunct
      brooklyn.enricher.basic.AbstractEnricher
          brooklyn.enricher.basic.AddingEnricher
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorEventListener
public class AddingEnricher
extends AbstractEnricher

enricher which adds multiple sensors on an entity to produce a new sensor Instead, consider calling: 

 addEnricher(Enrichers.builder()
         .combining(sources)
         .publishing(target)
         .computeSum()
         .build());

deprecated:
since 0.7.0; use Enrichers.builder()
See Also:
Combiner
